source.name: Laboratory Equipment Donation Program Widget
source.description: This widget is used to search and view the equipment list and the RSS feed of the latest equipment available through the DOE Laboratory Equipment Donation Program (LEDP), formerly the Energy-Related Laboratory Equipment (ERLE) Grant Program.The United States Department of Energy (DOE), in accordance with its responsibility to encourage research and development in the energy area, awards grants of used energy-related laboratory equipment.  The Laboratory Equipment Donation Program (LEDP) Grant Program was established by DOE to grant available excess of used energy-related laboratory equipment to middle schools, high schools, universities, colleges, junior colleges, technical institutes, museums, or hospitals in the United States for use in energy oriented educational programs. This grant program is sponsored by the DOE Office of Workforce Development for Teachers and Scientists (WDTS).
